articleContent.title: Chord: Augmented in C# (Shape: A)
articleContent.content:
# Chord: Augmented in C# (Shape: A)

## Description
The Augmented chord in C# with the Shape A consists of the notes C#, E, and G. It is built by taking a major chord and raising the fifth note a half step. This creates a unique and dissonant sound that can add tension and color to your music.

## Notes and Intervals
- C# (root)
- E (major third)
- G (augmented fifth)

## Genre and Musical Flavor
The Augmented chord in C# with the Shape A is often used in jazz, classical, and experimental music. It has a mysterious and tense quality that can evoke feelings of suspense and intrigue. This chord can be used to create a sense of unease or to add a surprising twist to your musical compositions.

## Songs
1. "Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds" by The Beatles
2. "The Girl from Ipanema" by Stan Getz & Astrud Gilberto
3. "Pet Sounds" by The Beach Boys
